svg.script: function go() { var animAttrHash = { "attributeName" : "stop-color", "from" : "yellowgreen", "by" : "rgb(200, 100, 250)" }; var graphicElemTag = "rect"; var graphicElemAttrHash = { "width" : "15px", "height" : "15px" }; testAnimatedGridWithDefs(graphicElemTag, graphicElemAttrHash, "fill", [ "linearGradient", "stop" ], "animate", [ animAttrHash ]); }
